extendedInfo.description: Drive the worldâs fastest cars and enjoy some of the highest performance racing action ever seen on Android.FEED YOUR NEEDDrive 20 cars, including the BMW M3 GT2, Lamborghini Gallardo, and Pagani Zonda. EVERY PRO CIRCUIT DETAILExperience the sweeping skylines of 18 tracks in inspiring international locations (Chicago, London, Tokyo) through day and night driving. See and feel roaring engines, squealing tires, and crunching collisions. Above all, get speed, speed, and more speed!UPGRADE, CUSTOMIZE, AND COMPETEFine tune performance with Top Speed, Acceleration, Tires, Suspension, and Nitrous upgrades. Add custom details like spoilers, rims, specialized paint jobs, and body kits.HOW DO YOU RACE? Jump into Quick Race or dominate the circuit in Career Mode. Select 3 Difficulty Settings (Rookie, Pro or Veteran). Track your evolution with DRIVER PROFILE.Grab hold and push it to the limit with the most visceral and aggressive racing game on Android!As always - due to the rich, immersive quality of this game - your download will take some time. We promise itâs worth the wait!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: No longer installs on Amaze 4G.
reviews.comment: I purchased this game while my HTC Amaze 4G was still running gingerbread. Now I\'m updated to ICS and it says not compatible. One star until support is added for Amaze ICS.  Downloaded on my T-Mobile myTouch 4G Slide and copied APK back to my Amaze and installed. The game works absolutely fine. Please remove this stupid market restriction.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it!
reviews.comment: Got this game 10 months ago, 3 updates ago the steering stopped working I can only turn right. Loved it when it worked. Galaxy captivate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, can no longer install.
reviews.comment: This was a great game.. I upgraded to honeycomb 3.1 and now I get the message \"This item is not compatible with your device. EA, I think you should get with the times and realize that not every customer own\'s an ipad or iphone. Android phones are growing quick, a multi million corporation like yourselves should be able to keep up with the times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Additional downloading content.
reviews.comment: After 30 minutes of trying to download the 150mb. And the continuous failed attempts. I tried wifi and 4g and rebooting my router. I give up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just awesome. Looks decent, plays great, tons of custom options, EA, you have something good here. Where is Shift 2 on Android guys?
reviews.author: Shaun Gephart

reviews.title: Awsome game!
reviews.comment: I\'m using an 800 mhz LG optimus slidder. The game is the best mobile racing I\'ve seen yet. Great graphics. Very smooth frame rate. Nice control. If your looking for a great racing game look no farther!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great graphics,  fluid gameplay with no lag, and very fun. One of the best racing games out for Android along with Asphalt 6.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great sim style racing
reviews.comment: I do like the asphalt series, but this one feels more real... I guess due to the forced accelerometer controls.  its a pretty challenging game, looks great, sounds okay, and plays really well. gt-i9000m
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not functioning on Motorola Atrix 2 MB865
reviews.comment: Video is not displaying correctly.  keep getting graphics display errors and error messages.  \"Error (airplay v4.3.0 [250761]) heap 0 out of memory.  please fix soon since this game is unusable in it\'s current state and it is listed as compatible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Compatibility vanished
reviews.comment: When I first purchased this game, it was compatible with both my Asus TF300T and my Motorola Atrix 2. Now, it is no longer compatible with either. What gives, EA?
reviews.author: Pat Andrews

reviews.title: Needs fixing
reviews.comment: My lock screen keeps locking when I\'m playing. Very annoying, plus I hate racing games so enough for me to uninstall and refund. Sgs2 Skyrocket 2.3.6.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I thought this game was going to be really good but everytime you download it, it says that you need to buy the game.  I don\'t know what kind of trick EA is trying to pull but when you spend $3.00 on a game that doesn\'t even work, it gets real frustrating.  I don\'t think any EA game is going to get more money out of me, but you can choose to waste yours if that\'s what you want to do.  Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Nathan McClelland

reviews.title: UPDATE TO JB
reviews.comment: EVERYONE, JOIN ME IN PROTEST AS WE RATE THIS WITH 1 STAR TO SEND EA A MESSAGE THAT WE WANT THIS GAME ON JELLY BEAN! COPY THIS TEXT INTO YOUR RATING OR PARAPHRASE AND TOGETHER, WE WILL INVOKE CHANGE!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: On a HTC EVO 4g, the game is good but even when I exit it fully, it still runs and drains my battary, if you fix it Il reinstall it .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Aftet downloading the app prompts you to connect to wifi to download 150mb of content. I dont have a wifi connection available so i go with the 3G option but nothig happens. Stays stuck on the downloading screen at 0%. Very dissapointing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix it EA
reviews.comment: Phone goes to sleep while using menu and game play.  Forced to touch the screen once in awhile to keep this from happening. Galaxy S II.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: galaxy nexus suddenly not compatible?
reviews.comment: I bought this game when it was .99 with my shiny galaxy nexus.  After a few rom install I notice this game is no longer on my phone, only to find out that it has been selectively remove from my market.  This is BS...fix it google!  Or you are asking me to go search for an .apk I legally own!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Read the one star reviews.
reviews.comment: Read the one star reviews below if you bought the game last year on sale. EA is ripping Android users off. Says there is an update but cannot do it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great 3D racing game Runs smoothly and a lot of fun to play. I got it for $0.99 during EA\'s sale at the end of December. I\'ve had no problems with downloading, installing the additional content (~100MB) or playing the game. Definitely my favorite game! (Droid X)
reviews.author: A Google User
